script:
SetTooltip JHS_MarketRestoreOrUpgrade "$global.JHS_core_RestoreOrUpgradeTooltip"
SetTooltipHighlightColors JHS_MarketRestoreOrUpgrade buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MarketRestoreOrUpgrade $global.JHS_RestoreShip
options: 16:JHS_MarketRestoreOrUpgrade:$global.JHS_core_RestoreOrUpgradeStr $global.JHS_RestoreShip

script:
$menuState = 16:JHS_MarketRestoreOrUpgrade
FireAll JNS_huboptions
SetShortcut JHS_BackToMarket_option ESCAPE
options: 99:JHS_BackToMarket_option:Back to the market

script:
$menuState = main 0
FireAll PopulateOptions

SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Restore_option "Cleaing $global.JHS_RestoreModsStr d-mod from $global.JHS_RestoreShip requires $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors JHS_MainHull_Restore_option buttonShortcut buttonShortcut buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MainHull_Restore_option $global.JHS_RestoreShip $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr $player.creditsStr
JHS_AddConfirmation JHS_MainHull_Restore_option "Cleaing $global.JHS_RestoreModsStr d-mod from $global.JHS_RestoreShip requires $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available. Do you want to proceed?"
options: 1:JHS_MainHull_Restore_option:Clear a d-mod from the hull

script:
SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Restore_option "Clearing $global.JHS_RestoreModsStr d-mod from $global.JHS_RestoreShip requires $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr credits. Only $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors JHS_MainHull_Restore_option buttonShortcut buttonShortcut bad
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MainHull_Restore_option $global.JHS_RestoreShip $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr $player.creditsStr
SetEnabled JHS_MainHull_Restore_option false
options: 1:JHS_MainHull_Restore_option:Clear a d-mod from the hull

script:
JHS_Core_RestoreShip
AddText "$global.JHS_RestoreShip is $global.JHS_RestoreAfterStr by clearing $global.JHS_RestoreRemovedDMod from the hull, at the cost of $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr credits. $global.JHS_RestoreNumDModsStr"
SetTextHighlightColors hColor bad hColor hColor
SetTextHighlights $global.JHS_RestoreShip $global.JHS_RestoreRemovedDMod $global.JHS_RestoreCostStr $global.JHS_RestoreNumDModsStrHighlight
FireAll JNS_huboptions

SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_U1_option "Installing this upgrade into $global.JHS_UpgradeShip requires $global.JHS_UpgradeU1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_U1_option buttonShortcut buttonShortcut buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_U1_option $global.JHS_UpgradeShip $global.JHS_UpgradeU1CostStr $player.creditsStr

script:
SetTooltip uwMarketSwapW2 "Swapping to this upgrade for $global.uwUpgradeShip requires $global.uwUpgradeW2SwapCostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available. Weapon slot upgrades: two medium slots are increased to large, twelve ballistic slots are changed to hybrid/composite/universal, and the Hellfire Cannon arc is increased to 360 degrees."
SetTooltipHighlightColors uwMarketSwapW2 buttonShortcut buttonShortcut buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights uwMarketSwapW2 $global.uwUpgradeShip $global.uwUpgradeW2SwapCostStr $player.creditsStr
JHS_AddConfirmation uwMarketSwapW2 "Reverting the built-in Diablo Cannon to a Hellfire Cannon, further upgrading modular weapon slots, and increasing maximum ordnance points by 20 for $global.uwUpgradeShip requires $global.uwUpgradeW2SwapCostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available. Do you want to proceed?"
options: 9:JHS_MainHull_SWap_W1_option:[Armaments] Revert modular weapon slots and clear build-in wings and install build-in B-deck

script:
SetTooltip uwMarketSwapW2 "Swapping to this upgrade for $global.uwUpgradeShip requires $global.uwUpgradeW2SwapCostStr credits. Only $player.creditsStr credits are available. id: #Last Upgrades added only after ship has all other upgrades

script:
SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_S1_option "Installing this upgrade into $global.JHS_UpgradeShip requires $global.JHS_UpgradeM1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option buttonShortcut buttonShortcut buttonShortcut
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option $global.JHS_UpgradeShip $global.JHS_UpgradeM1CostStr $player.creditsStr
JHS_AddConfirmation JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option "Rewamping both modules of $global.JHS_UpgradeShip to be cargo modules requires $global.JHS_UpgradeM1CostStr credits. $player.creditsStr credits are available. Do you want to proceed?"
options: 12:JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_S1_option:[System] Change ship system to Burn Drive

script:
SetTooltip JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_S1_option "Installing this upgrade into $global.JHS_UpgradeShip requires $global.JHS_UpgradeM1CostStr credits. Only $player.creditsStr credits are available."
SetTooltipHighlightColors JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option buttonShortcut buttonShortcut bad
SetTooltipHighlights JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option $global.JHS_UpgradeShip $global.JHS_UpgradeM1CostStr $player.creditsStr
SetEnabled JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_M1_option false
options: 12:JHS_MainHull_Upgrade_S1_option:[System] Change ship system to Burn Drive

script:
JHS_Core_UpgradeShip S1
FireAll JNS_huboptions
